title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it produces a beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not produce a beep sound when SWT.MULTI is chosen.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ControlExampleText. 
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option. 
3. Observe the beep sound being produced.
